metadata.title: CVE-2020-29663 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Icinga 2 v2.8.0 through v2.11.7 and v2.12.2 has an issue where revokedcertificates due for renewal will automatically be renewed, ignoring theCRL. This issue is fixed in Icinga 2 v2.11.8 and v2.12.3.

criterions.comment: icinga2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
